thread.title: Capital One, Apollo Said to Mull Final Bids for GE Healthcare Finance, Bloomberg
thread.title_full: Capital One, Apollo Said to Mull Final Bids for GE Healthcare Finance, Bloomberg

title: Capital One, Apollo Said to Mull Final Bids for GE Healthcare Finance, Bloomberg
text:
Capital One, Apollo Said to Mull Final Bids for GE Healthcare Finance, Bloomberg July 27, 2015, 07:05 AM Related: Apollo Global Management , Capital One Bank , Ge Capital , GE Healthcare Financial Services , General Electric Capital , General Electric Company 
Bloomberg reported Capital One Financial Corp. and Apollo Global Management are poised to make final bids for General Electric Co.â€™s health-care finance unit, people with knowledge of the matter said.According to the Bloomberg report, final offers are due next week and could fetch more than $11 billion, said the people, who asked not to be identified because the details are private. At least one other bidder is expected to submit a proposal, the people said.To read the full Bloomberg report, click here . Today's Other News
